Description.Text:
Property Location
Located in Rome (EUR), Hotel Dei Congressi is minutes from Museum of Roman Civilization and Palazzo dei Congressi. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of White Gallery and Museo Nazionale delle Arti e Tradizioni Popolari.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 105 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature complimentary toiletries and bidets. Conveniences include safes and desks, and you can also request cribs/infant beds.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy recreation amenities such as a 24-hour fitness center or take in the view from a garden. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves lunch and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, a computer station, and express check-in. Planning an event in Rome? This hotel has 4263 square feet (396 square meters) of space consisting of a conference center and meeting rooms.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves lunch and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

Located in Rome (EUR), Hotel Dei Congressi is minutes from Museum of Roman Civilization and Palazzo dei Congressi. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of White Gallery and Museo Nazionale delle Arti e Tradizioni Popolari.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Museum of Roman Civilization - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Palazzo dei Congressi - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
White Gallery - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Museo Nazionale delle Arti e Tradizioni Popolari - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Palazzo della Civilta Italiana - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Abbazia delle Tre Fontane - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
PalaLottomatica - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Euroma2 - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
I Granai Shopping Center - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Basilica of St. Paul Outside the Walls - 3.1 km / 2 mi
Roma Tre University - 3.6 km / 2.2 mi
Catacombs of St. Domitilla - 4.1 km / 2.6 mi
Montemartini Museum - 4.2 km / 2.6 mi
Fosse Ardeatine - 4.3 km / 2.6 mi
Catacombs of St. Callixtus - 4.5 km / 2.8 mi

The nearest airports are:
Rome (CIA-Ciampino) - 10.4 km / 6.4 mi
Rome (FCO-Fiumicino - Leonardo da Vinci Intl.) - 18.8 km / 11.7 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Dei Congressi is Rome (FCO-Fiumicino - Leonardo da Vinci Intl.).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.
